editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Miracles. Pp 1-42: Nine Miracles of Mary, Tä’ammǝrä Maryam, ተአምረ፡ ማርያም፡ The standard works on the miracles of Mary are Cerulli, Maria, and Budge, Mary. An exhaustive collection has been published in Ethiopia, Tä’ammǝrä Maryam (Addis Ababa: Tǝnśa’e zä-guba’e, 1989 E.C.) EMML 2058, 2059, and 2060. See Delamarter, et al, MYS 1 for a description of 371 miracles. P. i gives the date of completion 1941 EC = 1948-9 and mentions many names. Pp. 42-45: One Miracle of Jesus, Tä’ammǝrä Iyyäsus, ተአምረ፡ ኢየሱስ፡. S. Grébaut, Les Miracles de Jésus, texte éthiopien publié et traduit par S. Grébaut, PO 12:4 = 60. See also StrBL, entry 16 [Or. 8824] and the extensive bibliography there. Pp. 45-48: Three Miracles of Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, Tä’ammǝrä Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, ተአምረ፡ ገብረ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡. Pp. 49-54: One Miracles of Mary. Pp. 17 and passim mention the name of the owner, "This book was completed in 1941 EC in the year of Saint Matthew. Its writer is መምሬ ዐቢዩ, baptismal name, ወልደ ጊዮርጊስ. The name of his wife is ወለተ ኢየሱስ. The name of his father is ወልደ ሥላሴ. The name of his mother is ወለተ ዮሐንስ."

origin.origDate: F. i v gives the date of completion 1941 EC = 1948-9

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
